summary: The module implements an image retrieval pipeline that extracts CLIP embeddings from images, builds a FAISS vector index, and enables fast similarity search for individual or batch queries. It includes configuration handling, dataset loading utilities, and preprocessing helpers for image normalization and feature extraction.
business_intent: To provide a reusable component for research and applications that need to locate visually similar images efficiently using state-of-the-art CLIP representations and scalable nearest-neighbor indexing.
